Research

Projects

Photography

I enjoy taking pictures of nature as I hike and camp. Also since I stay up long nights as a part of my research, I have experimented with long exposures and night time astrophotography.

The picture I took below won first prize in the 2016 Kirkham’s National Parks photo contest. I received one of Kirkham’s Spring Bar Tents as a prize.

Grand Teton NP at the Snake River Overlook

Nature

The Drum Mountains in Millard County, Utah, after a wet spring. Looking very green for the Sevier desert.

Rainbow in Banff NP, Canada.

Two Moose staring each other down early in the morning in the Wasatch Range.

Astrophotography

Long Exposure of the Milky Way Galaxy Behind TAx4 Fluorescence Detectors (FDs) of the Telescope Array Cosmic Ray Observatory

Long Exposure of the sunrise at the TAx4 FDs of the Telescope Array Cosmic Ray Observatory

Long Exposure TAx4 FDs with some light painting using a green LED headlamp

Lunar Eclipse on 2019-01-21
